entries.journal_entry_description: Yraka Nes cares for the Myyydril people and keeps their spirits high by making Luilris Pies. However, she's run out of the most important ingredient; Luilris Mushrooms. In the caves, Luilris Mushrooms grow and are farmed daily. She needs 10 of them to make her pies.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Collect 10 Luilris Mushrooms and bring them back to Yraka Nes.
